description: '''Diva house''' or '''handbag house''' is an [[Gay anthem|anthemic]] subgenre of [[house music]] that became most popular in gay clubs during the second half of the 1990s. ''The Encyclopedia of Contemporary British Culture'' defines handbag house as having "prominent female vocals, breakdowns, and a proliferation of piano 'stabs'." Modern diva house compositions use synth stabs and [[Four on the floor (music)|four on the floor]] rhythms.
